name: Ares Fighter 2
description:
[Introduction to the game]
'Ares Fighter 2' is a vertical scroll flying shooting game. The player controls the protagonist's aircraft to fight with the enemy in the air.

[Game control]
Players can control the game through keyboard, keyboard+mouse or handle.

[Game features]
Players can get diamonds by destroying enemy planes, and diamonds can upgrade the protagonist's fighters in the supply station. The types that can be upgraded include the number of bullets, the power of bullets, lasers, protective covers, large range attack weapons, and so on.
After shooting down the key enemy aircraft, the escort fighter will fall, and the firepower can be increased after being equipped.
Players can gain experience when they hit the enemy aircraft. After the experience is full, the main gun and auxiliary gun of the fighter will be upgraded. When the level reaches the maximum, the protagonist's fighter will enter the hot blood state.
